experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description:
Route Optimization (Python, Flask LogisticsOS, Postgres)

Improved performance by an order of magnitude enabling migration to web product
Notification Center(Knock, Kafka, Python, Flask, Postgres)

OrderManagement Integration(Python, Lambda, DynamoDB, Flask, Postgres)
- Built integration with Order Management platform. Events were read from customer tables periodically and pushed to the the backend where orders would be processed

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description:
Apps Portal (Ruby on Rails, React/Redux, Postgres, Websockets)

 - Built an Apps Manager to allow users to edit app metadata as well as delete apps from groups. Added locking mechanism to prevent race conditions from multiple users
 - Built Publisher allowing authorized users to publish catalogs through a web interface. Pushed logs from asynchronous publishing job to users through websockets
 - Refactored parts of Catalog portion of Apps portal. Created and implemented database schema, api as well as React components allowing Fingerprint content team to create, edit and maintain content catalogs for Fingerprint partners
 - Refactored Apps portion of portal to modern frontend architecture. Migrated from
static pages to dynamic react application

WebAPI (Java, Spring Boot, Jersey, MongoDB, Python)

- Built backend for QA override tool allowing QA team to manage stripe subscriptions
- Built endpoints to update client information dynamically, push client metadata to Stripe Dashboard, provide payment gateway information, etc.
- Implemented python script utilizing concurrent threads to generate coupons using the stripe api. Sped up previous script by 100x

Metrics Server (Ruby, Sinatra, Sidekiq, Postgres, MongoDB, Cron Jobs)

- Built a scheduled job system for gathering data from a number of APIs such as Stripe, Brightcove, Google, etc., chunked the results and pushed to Mixpanel
- In order to deal with more complicated queries from Stripe, provided raw SQL and a webhook to Stripe Sigma and received query results in the form of CSV files

accomplishment_projects.title: Tldr
accomplishment_projects.description:
Mobile news aggregation application 

- Utilized the  News API to aggregate current news articles and implemented the SMMRY API to compile stories by 85-90%
- Integrated Text To Speech to allow users to listen to article summaries as they browse their feed
- Implemented React Native/Redux to design a reusable frontend architecture and built intuitive mobile views

There is a lot of news out there. We created a mobile application that aggregates news articles from trusted news sources and summarizes them down to the most important parts. Additionally, in order to allow users to consume news in the most convenient ways possible, we added Speech To Text functionality so that news could be heard as well.
